question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Sher Shah Suri?
1. He was a pious Muslim but adopted a tolerant attitude towards other religions.
2. He also employed Hindus in important offices.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Sher Shah Suri was a pious Muslim but he adopted a tolerant attitude towards other religions also. He also employed Hindus in important offices during his rule. He was also a patron of art and architecture.
